cast.overview: After working as a drug courier and getting into a brutal shootout with police, a former boxer finds himself at the mercy of his enemies as they force him to instigate violent acts that turn the prison he resides in into a battleground.
cast.title: Brawl in Cell Block 99

details.biography: Dan Amboyer (born December 28, 1985) is an American actor, best known for his starring roles on the Darren Star hit series Younger (TV series), the limited NBC spin-off series The Blacklist: Redemption, and for starring as Prince William of Wales in the film William & Catherine: A Royal Romance, which also starred Victor Garber, Jean Smart, and Jane Alexander.
details.name: Dan Amboyer
